aga_swarm/actions.name: actions
aga_swarm/actions.description: This is the root of the action space

aga_swarm/actions/swarm.name: swarm
aga_swarm/actions/swarm.description:
This folder contains all actions pertaining to internal swarm operations such as:
- navigating the action space to find the best action to take
- navigating the swarm memory to find relevant information
- different types of actions/memories and how to handle them

aga_swarm/actions/data.name: data
aga_swarm/actions/data.description: This folder contains all actions pertaining to data operations on any cloud provider or local machines

aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types.name: action_types
aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types.description: Every action in the action space has a type. This folder contains all the actions to handle each type of action. Each of these will take the action type, params and the swarm and return the output of said action.

aga_swarm/actions/swarm/manager/manager..name: manager.py
aga_swarm/actions/swarm/manager/manager..description: The manager's task is to break down directives into managable pieces.

directive.description: The directive to be broken down

aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types/act.name: action.py
aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types/act.description: Passes the action to the appropriate action_type for execution. This function serves as a universal entry point for executing actions. Every action action_type is expected to follow the default_swarm_action.py action type.

action_id.description: The type of action to be taken

aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types/int.name: internal_default_swarm_action.py
aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types/int.description: This action type is only used to execute actions that are defined in the swarm package itself. It simply calls the main function of the action script specified by the action_id with the params provided.

action_id.description: The type of action to be taken

aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types/def.name: default_swarm_action.py
aga_swarm/actions/swarm/action_types/def.description: This action calls the main function of the action script specified by the action_id with the params provided.

action_id.description: The type of action to be taken

aga_swarm/actions/data/file_operations/d.description: This folder contains all actions pertaining to file deletion operations on any cloud provider or local machines

aga_swarm/actions/data/file_operations/r.name: retrieve_file.py
aga_swarm/actions/data/file_operations/r.description: This action calls the appropriate file retrieval action based on the 'platform' param in the swarm config

file_path.description: The path to the file to be retrieved

aga_swarm/actions/data/file_operations/r.description: This action retrieves a file from a mac
